definition: to lower/to decrease/to reduce/to subtract/to diminish

sentences.english: Besides, simplify the circuit, improve dependability of the stabilizer and interference-free ability .
sentences.chinese: 同時，簡化電路，提高減搖鰭的可靠性和抗干擾能力。

sentences.english: The application of fault diagnosis in fin stabilizer control system.
sentences.chinese: 故障診斷技術及其在減搖鰭系統中的應用。

sentences.english: The first, the design of fin stabilizer.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分，進行了減搖鰭設計工作。
